geninfo.para: This TSI applies to DT 466 engines built starting the fall of 2005 with 245 bhp rating and below.

Manufacturing plant - New valve spring retainers (1858412C1) have been released to replace exhaust valve rotators on engines with a 245 bhp rating or lower. Retainers will only be used in the manufacturing of new engines.
Service environment - Valve rotators (1835655C1) for all valves will be available for service, regardless of brake horsepower rating.
Engines originally equipped with exhaust valve spring retainers (1858412C1) will be serviced with valve rotators (1835655C1).

note.para: It is not necessary to replace valve rotators or valve spring retainers unless components display cracking or unusual wear patterns. In the event an exhaust valve retainer requires replacement, it must be serviced with the current valve rotator (1835655C1) and only in sets (both exhaust valves for that cylinder).
